mapper.select: SELECT building_smear.*,co.COUNTY_NAME,co.city_code,co.city_name,SUBSTR(building_smear.scccode,1,2) AS scc1,SUBSTR(building_smear.scccode,3,2) AS scc2, SUBSTR(building_smear.scccode,5,3) AS scc3,SUBSTR(building_smear.scccode,8,3) AS scc4 FROM building_smear LEFT JOIN ( SELECT county.COUNTY_ID,county.COUNTY_NAME,city.city_name,city.city_code FROM county LEFT JOIN city ON county.city_code=city.city_code ) co ON co.COUNTY_ID=building_smear.county_id where building_smear.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into building_smear
id,
year,
county_id,
paint_amount,
scccode,
pm10_emission,
pm25_emission,
voc_emission,
nh3_emission,
so2_emission,
co_emission,
oc_emission,
bc_emission,
nox_emission,
flagd,
source_descrip,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{year,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{countyId,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{paintAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{scccode,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{pm10Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{pm25Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{vocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},

#{coEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},

#{bcEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},

#{sourceDescrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

insert into building_smear (id, year, county_id, paint_amount, scccode, pm10_emission, pm25_emission, voc_emission, nh3_emission, so2_emission, co_emission, oc_emission, bc_emission, nox_emission, flagd, source_descrip) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{year,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{countyId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{paintAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{scccode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{pm10Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{pm25Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{vocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{nh3Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{so2Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{coEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{ocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{bcEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{noxEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{flagd,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{sourceDescrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, year = #{year,jdbcType=CHAR}, county_id = #{countyId,jdbcType=CHAR}, paint_amount = #{paintAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, scccode = #{scccode,jdbcType=CHAR}, pm10_emission = #{pm10Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pm25_emission = #{pm25Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, voc_emission = #{vocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, nh3_emission = #{nh3Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, so2_emission = #{so2Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, co_emission = #{coEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, oc_emission = #{ocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, bc_emission = #{bcEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, nox_emission = #{noxEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, flagd = #{flagd,jdbcType=TINYINT}, source_descrip = #{sourceDescrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
update building_smear
year = #{year,jdbcType=CHAR},
county_id = #{countyId,jdbcType=CHAR},
paint_amount = #{paintAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
scccode = #{scccode,jdbcType=CHAR},
pm10_emission = #{pm10Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
pm25_emission = #{pm25Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
voc_emission = #{vocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
nh3_emission = #{nh3Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
so2_emission = #{so2Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
co_emission = #{coEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
oc_emission = #{ocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
bc_emission = #{bcEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
nox_emission = #{noxEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
flagd = #{flagd,jdbcType=TINYINT},
source_descrip = #{sourceDescrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
